data.comment: Today's match is followed by 35000 spectators.
Dennis Higler starts the match. Feyenoord with the kick-off in Eindhoven.
Dennis Higler starts the match. Feyenoord with the kick-off in Eindhoven.
Eindhoven awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Feyenoord just outside Eindhoven's area.
Robert Bozenik for Feyenoord gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Eindhoven goal kick.
Robert Bozenik (Feyenoord) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dennis Higler signals a throw-in for Feyenoord, close to Eindhoven's area.
Steven Berghuis of Feyenoord smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Eindhoven in their own half.
Dennis Higler signals a Eindhoven throw-in in Feyenoord's half.
Corner awarded to Eindhoven.
In Eindhoven, Pablo Rosario (Eindhoven) misses the target with a header.
Feyenoord have a goal kick.
Steven Berghuis (Feyenoord) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Feyenoord in Eindhoven.
Eindhoven are pushing forward but Sam Lammers's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Feyenoord at Philips Stadion.
Free kick for Feyenoord in the half of Eindhoven.
Dennis Higler awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Eindhoven in their own half.
Ball safe as Eindhoven is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eindhoven to take a throw-in in Feyenoord territory.
Throw-in Feyenoord.
Feyenoord drives forward and Jens Toornstra gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Feyenoord in the half of Eindhoven.
Feyenoord drive forward but Robert Bozenik is judged offside.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Eindhoven in their own half.
In Eindhoven, Eindhoven push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Eindhoven get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Feyenoord's half?
Feyenoord awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Feyenoord in their own half.
Feyenoord have a dangerous throw-in.
Important block from the Feyenoord defence as Jorrit Hendrix fires in a strike for Eindhoven.
Eindhoven have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Eindhoven push forward at Philips Stadion and Ryan Thomas gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Feyenoord defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Eindhoven.
Feyenoord pushes forward through Orkun Kokcu, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Feyenoord in the half of Eindhoven.
Feyenoord have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Feyenoord to take a throw-in in Eindhoven territory.
Corner awarded to Feyenoord.
Goal! Feyenoord take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Eric Botteghin.
Orkun Kokcu instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Eindhoven close to the penalty box.
Dennis Higler awards Feyenoord a goal kick.
Free kick Eindhoven.
Dennis Higler signals a Eindhoven throw-in in Feyenoord's half.
Throw-in for Feyenoord at Philips Stadion.
Eindhoven awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Eindhoven, Ryan Thomas of Eindhoven is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Feyenoord needs to be cautious. Eindhoven have an attacking throw-in.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Feyenoord in their own half.
Throw-in for Eindhoven at Philips Stadion.
Throw-in Feyenoord.
Can Eindhoven get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Feyenoord's half?
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Feyenoord capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Eindhoven's half?
The first half has been concluded at Philips Stadion.
Eindhoven have kicked-off the second half at Philips Stadion.
Throw-in for Feyenoord in their own half.
Corner awarded to Feyenoord.
Goal! Eindhoven go level at 1-1 through Cody Gakpo in Eindhoven.
Ryan Thomas with an assist there.
Cody Gakpo (Eindhoven) has received a yellow card from Dennis Higler.
Feyenoord awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Feyenoord.
Eindhoven have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Eindhoven at Philips Stadion.
Can Feyenoord get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eindhoven's half?
Dennis Higler awards Eindhoven a goal kick.
Robert Bozenik for the away team is judged to be offside.
Feyenoord will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Eindhoven.
Ball goes out of play for a Feyenoord goal kick.
Can Eindhoven capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tyrell Malacia for Feyenoord has been booked by Dennis Higler and receives a first yellow card.
Feyenoord drive upfield and Rick Karsdorp gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Eindhoven defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Eindhoven are coming forward and Cody Gakpo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Eindhoven.
Cody Gakpo's header is off-target for Eindhoven.
Ball goes out of play for a Feyenoord goal kick.
Ball safe as Feyenoord is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Feyenoord have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Corner awarded to Feyenoord.
Feyenoord have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Dennis Higler awards the home team a throw-in.
Sam Lammers for Eindhoven drives towards goal at Philips Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Feyenoord close to the penalty box.
Dennis Higler signals a throw-in for Feyenoord, close to Eindhoven's area.
In Eindhoven Feyenoord drive forward through Steven Berghuis. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Eindhoven have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Eindhoven in the half of Feyenoord.
Feyenoord's Robert Bozenik is on target but unsuccessful.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Eindhoven in their own half.
Corner awarded to Eindhoven.
Luciano Narsingh is on a sub for Robert Bozenik for Feyenoord.
Feyenoord have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Throw-in Feyenoord.
Feyenoord are in shooting range from this free kick.
Feyenoord have been awarded a corner by Dennis Higler.
Feyenoord's Marcos Senesi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Dennis Higler awards Eindhoven a goal kick.
Cody Gakpo (Eindhoven) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Feyenoord's Luciano Narsingh is whistled for offside at Philips Stadion.
Bruma is replacing Cody Gakpo for Eindhoven at Philips Stadion.
In Eindhoven a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sam Lammers (Eindhoven) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Eindhoven.
Steven Berghuis (Feyenoord) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Eindhoven to take a throw-in in Feyenoord territory.
Ernest Faber (Eindhoven) is making a second substitution, with Kostas Mitroglou replacing Sam Lammers.
Goal kick for Feyenoord at Philips Stadion.
Dennis Higler signals a Feyenoord throw-in in Eindhoven's half.
Free kick in a good position for Feyenoord!
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Mohammed Ihattaren.
Eindhoven awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mohammed Ihattaren is back on his feet again.
Feyenoord awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Eindhoven is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eindhoven have a goal kick.
Dennis Higler signals a free kick to Eindhoven.
At Philips Stadion, Feyenoord are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Eindhoven.
Dennis Higler blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Ritsu Doan (Eindhoven) has replaced the possibly injured Mohammed Ihattaren at Philips Stadion.
Feyenoord's Orkun Kokcu has been booked in Eindhoven.
